summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1363, for the improvement of Barrett Street, in the City of Seattle, from Fifteenth Avenue West to Seventeenth Avenue West, by constructing concrete walks thereon, together with necessary curbs, gutters and cross walks, under Ordinance No. 15031 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
